summary: Allows Azura's Star to capture Black Souls
descriptionHtml:
[font=Arial, Helvetica, Verdana, sans-serif][color=#f4f4f4]This mod makes Azura's Star functionally identical to The Black Star, you may now capture Black Souls in Azura's Star.
[/color][/font][font=Arial, Helvetica, Verdana, sans-serif][color=#f4f4f4]
[/color][/font][font=Arial, Helvetica, Verdana, sans-serif][color=#f4f4f4]I made this mod because I thought it was pointless to have a choice between Azura's Star and The Black Star when one is a superior choice to the other gameplay wise. Whether you hate or love the Daedra, you should receive a benefit. 
[/color][/font][font=Arial, Helvetica, Verdana, sans-serif][color=#f4f4f4]
[/color][/font][font=Arial, Helvetica, Verdana, sans-serif][color=#f4f4f4]Azura's Star is unique in that it is a reusable soul gem, a necessity for enchanters. While The Black star can trap ANY soul, Azura's Star may only capture souls from creatures. This mod fixes that. [/color][/font][font=Arial, Helvetica, Verdana, sans-serif][color=#f4f4f4]
[/color][/font][font=Arial, Helvetica, Verdana, sans-serif][color=#f4f4f4]

[/color][/font][font=Arial, Helvetica, Verdana, sans-serif][color=#f4f4f4]No DLC is required.[/color][/font]
author: JakeDuck
